body:
Comment 9: 
Ian, thank you for the great explanation. Especially the part regarding cgo was very
insightful.

Just for clarification, I didn't mean to say that Go and SWIG should move forward in
lockstop. All I wanted to say is that 'go build' should fail with a good error message
in case a too old Go version is in use. ;-)

Should I open a bug regarding exporting and checking the Go version number?
